Plot
Jeffrey leads a quiet existence. Living in constant fear of being 
labeled a psychopath, Jeffrey constructs a complex world of denial. 
He is haunted by the spirits of the vengeful dead, which he can 
see while no one else can. After meeting Dana, a beautiful young 
woman who shares his "sight", Jeffery finds comfort in knowing 
someone shares his affliction. But his comfort is short lived. 
Dana suddenly goes missing and Jeffrey is l
eft alone to find the answers.
